entities.name: katie
entities.description: Katie is a student at Hogwarts who is playing Quidditch. She has her hands outstretched to catch the ball but it hits her in the face instead.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a student at Hogwarts who is playing Quidditch and passes the ball to Katie, hitting her in the face.

entities.name: angelina
entities.description: Angelina is a teacher or coach of the team that Katie and Ron are playing for. She gives instructions to the players.

entities.name: bludgers
entities.description: Bludgers are objects used in Quidditch that can knock players off their brooms.

relationships.description: Ron hits Katie with the ball, causing her to bleed from the nose.
Angelina orders Ron to get back in position and not knock Katie off her broom.
